title: premium hextech chest
body: i'm level 5 and i didn't get premium hextech chest i logged in 3 times it doesn't appear

replies.body: It can take up to a day for your [new player chest ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)to appear on your account.  Hang in there, and the goodies will come!
